verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses פְּסָל־ <S%H6458><s%> Hew לְךָ֛ שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> thee two לֻחֹ֥ת <S%H3871><s%> tables אֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> of stone כָּרִאשֹׁנִ֑ים <S%H7223><s%> like unto the first וְכָתַבְתִּי֙ <S%H3789><s%> and I will write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <S%H3871><s%> upon [these] tables אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַלֻּחֹ֥ת <S%H3871><s%> tables הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <S%H7223><s%> that were in the first אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שִׁבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H7665><s%> which thou brakest

וֶהְיֵ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become נָכ֖וֹן <S%H3559><s%> And be ready לַבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וְעָלִ֤יתָ <S%H5927><s%> and come up בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> in the morning אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> unto mount סִינַ֔י <S%H5514><s%> Sinai וְנִצַּבְתָּ֥ <S%H5324><s%> and present לִ֛י שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> thyself there to me in the top הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> of the mount

וְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> And no man לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come up עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> let וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> any אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> let any man אַל־ <S%H408><s%> with thee neither יֵרָ֖א <S%H7200><s%> be seen בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> anywhere הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> throughout all the mount גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even הַצֹּ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> neither let the flocks וְהַבָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> nor herds אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor יִרְע֔וּ <S%H7462><s%> feed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in מ֖וּל <S%H4136><s%> before הָהָ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> that mount הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיִּפְסֹ֡ל <S%H6458><s%> And he hewed שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> two לֻחֹ֨ת <S%H3871><s%> tables אֲבָנִ֜ים <S%H68><s%> of stone כָּרִאשֹׁנִ֗ים <S%H7223><s%> like unto the first וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> rose up early מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> and went up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> unto mount סִינַ֔י <S%H5514><s%> Sinai כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> him and took בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> the two לֻחֹ֥ת <S%H3871><s%> tables אֲבָנִֽים׃ <S%H68><s%> of stone

וַיֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> descended יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בֶּֽעָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> in the cloud וַיִּתְיַצֵּ֥ב <S%H3320><s%> and stood עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> with him there and proclaimed בְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיַּעֲבֹ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> passed by יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פָּנָיו֮ <S%H6440><s%> before him וַיִּקְרָא֒ <S%H7121><s%> and proclaimed יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God רַח֖וּם <S%H7349><s%> merciful וְחַנּ֑וּן <S%H2587><s%> and gracious אֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> slow אַפַּ֖יִם <S%H639><s%> to anger וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> and abundant חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> in goodness וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> and truth

נֹצֵ֥ר <S%H5341><s%> Keeping חֶ֙סֶד֙ <S%H2617><s%> mercy לָאֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> for thousands נֹשֵׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> forgiving עָוֹ֛ן <S%H5771><s%> iniquity וָפֶ֖שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> and transgression וְחַטָּאָ֑ה <S%H2403><s%> and sin וְנַקֵּה֙ <S%H5352><s%> and that will by no means לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יְנַקֶּ֔ה <S%H5352><s%> clear פֹּקֵ֣ד ׀ <S%H6485><s%> [the guilty] visiting עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity אָב֗וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בָּנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> upon the children וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and upon the children's בָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> the children עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto שִׁלֵּשִׁ֖ים <S%H8029><s%> children unto the third וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רִבֵּעִֽים׃ <S%H7256><s%> and to the fourth
וַיְמַהֵ֖ר <S%H4116><s%> made haste מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וַיִּקֹּ֥ד <S%H6915><s%> and bowed his head אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> toward the earth וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If נָא֩ <S%H4994><s%> now מָצָ֨אתִי <S%H4672><s%> If now I have found חֵ֤ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight אֲדֹנָ֔י <S%H136><s%> O Lord יֵֽלֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> go נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> pray אֲדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> let my Lord בְּקִרְבֵּ֑נוּ <S%H7130><s%> among כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> even עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people קְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> churlish עֹ֙רֶף֙ <S%H6203><s%> stiff-necked ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְסָלַחְתָּ֛ <S%H5545><s%> and pardon לַעֲוֹנֵ֥נוּ <S%H5771><s%> our iniquity וּלְחַטָּאתֵ֖נוּ <S%H2403><s%> and our sin וּנְחַלְתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5157><s%> and take us for thine inheritance

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִי֮ <S%H595><s%> I כֹּרֵ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> Behold I make בְּרִית֒ <S%H1285><s%> a covenant נֶ֤גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Before כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> before all thy people אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> I will do נִפְלָאֹ֔ת <S%H6381><s%> marvels אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נִבְרְא֥וּ <S%H1254><s%> such as have not been done בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in all the earth וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> nor in any nation וְרָאָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> which thou [art] shall see כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָ֠עָם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> you בְקִרְבּ֜וֹ <S%H7130><s%> among אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> is a נוֹרָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> for it [is] a terrible thing ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> that I will do עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> be sure

שְׁמָ֨ר־ <S%H8104><s%> Observe לְךָ֔ אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֣ <S%H6680><s%> thou that which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day הִנְנִ֧י <S%H2005><s%> I am going גֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H1644><s%> behold I drive out מִפָּנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> thee the Amorite וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> and the Canaanite וְהַחִתִּי֙ <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzite וְהַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> and the Hivite וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusite

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> Take heed לְךָ֗ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> no תִּכְרֹ֤ת <S%H3772><s%> to thyself lest thou make בְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לְיוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> with the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> whither thou goest עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לְמוֹקֵ֖שׁ <S%H4170><s%> lest it be for a snare בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבְּחֹתָם֙ <S%H4196><s%> their altars תִּתֹּצ֔וּן <S%H5422><s%> But ye shall destroy וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַצֵּבֹתָ֖ם <S%H4676><s%> their images תְּשַׁבֵּר֑וּן <S%H7665><s%> break וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֵׁרָ֖יו <S%H842><s%> their groves תִּכְרֹתֽוּן׃ <S%H3772><s%> and cut down

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה <S%H7812><s%> For thou shalt worship לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> god אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> no other כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD קַנָּ֣א <S%H7067><s%> [is] Jealous שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God קַנָּ֖א <S%H7067><s%> [is] a jealous הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise תִּכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> Lest thou make בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לְיוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> with the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְזָנ֣וּ ׀ <S%H2181><s%> and they go a whoring אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> their gods וְזָבְחוּ֙ <S%H2076><s%> and do sacrifice לֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> unto their gods וְקָרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> and [one] call לְךָ֔ וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <S%H398><s%> thee and thou eat מִזִּבְחֽוֹ׃ <S%H2077><s%> of his sacrifice

וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> And thou take מִבְּנֹתָ֖יו <S%H1323><s%> of their daughters לְבָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H1121><s%> unto thy sons וְזָנ֣וּ <S%H2181><s%> go a whoring בְנֹתָ֗יו <S%H1323><s%> and their daughters אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H430><s%> their gods וְהִזְנוּ֙ <S%H2181><s%> go a whoring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנֶ֔יךָ <S%H1121><s%> thy sons אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H430><s%> their gods
אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> gods מַסֵּכָ֖ה <S%H4541><s%> thee no molten לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no תַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> Thou shalt make לָּֽךְ׃

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַ֣ג <S%H2282><s%> The feast הַמַּצּוֹת֮ <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread תִּשְׁמֹר֒ <S%H8104><s%> shalt thou keep שִׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H7651><s%> Seven יָמִ֜ים <S%H3117><s%> days תֹּאכַ֤ל <S%H398><s%> thou shalt eat מַצּוֹת֙ <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> I צִוִּיתִ֔ךָ <S%H6680><s%> as I commanded לְמוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> thee in the time חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month הָאָבִ֑יב <S%H24><s%> Abib כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> in בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> for in the month הָֽאָבִ֔יב <S%H24><s%> Abib יָצָ֖אתָ <S%H3318><s%> thou camest out מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> from Egypt

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every פֶּ֥טֶר <S%H6363><s%> All that openeth רֶ֖חֶם <S%H7358><s%> the matrix לִ֑י וְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מִקְנְךָ֙ <S%H4735><s%> among thy cattle תִּזָּכָ֔ר <S%H2142><s%> [that is male פֶּ֖טֶר <S%H6363><s%> [is] mine and every firstling שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> [whether] ox וָשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H7716><s%> or sheep

וּפֶ֤טֶר <S%H6363><s%> But the firstling חֲמוֹר֙ <S%H2543><s%> of an ass תִּפְדֶּ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> thou shalt redeem בְשֶׂ֔ה <S%H7716><s%> with a lamb וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> None תִפְדֶּ֖ה <S%H6299><s%> and if thou redeem וַעֲרַפְתּ֑וֹ <S%H6202><s%> [him] not then shalt thou break his neck כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all בְּכ֤וֹר <S%H1060><s%> All the firstborn בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> of thy sons תִּפְדֶּ֔ה <S%H6299><s%> thou shalt redeem וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> None יֵרָא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> And none shall appear פָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> me empty

שֵׁ֤שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> Six יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days תַּעֲבֹ֔ד <S%H5647><s%> thou shalt work וּבַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> but on the seventh תִּשְׁבֹּ֑ת <S%H7673><s%> thou shalt rest בֶּחָרִ֥ישׁ <S%H2758><s%> in earing time וּבַקָּצִ֖יר <S%H7105><s%> and in harvest תִּשְׁבֹּֽת׃ <S%H7673><s%> thou shalt rest
